Indinesia: Parliamentary and local elections: Golkar party of former President Suharto wins greatest share of vote, with Megawati Sukarnoputri's PDI-P coming second.
A bomb blast outside the Australian embassy in Jakarta kills 11 and injures up to 100 people.
Indonesia's first direct presidential election elects Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono following popular disillusionment with incumbent Megawati.
An earthquake-triggered tsunami kills an estimated 170,000 in Aceh and causes widespread devastation.
